meanings.definition: A term used to refer to fathers or priests.
meanings.sent1: My padres always support me in everything I do.
meanings.sent2: The padres at the church are very kind and helpful.
meanings.sent3: When the two padres walked into the room, everyone felt a sense of peace.
meanings.sent4: The padres of the community are like guiding stars in our lives.
meanings.sent5: I will always cherish the wisdom passed down by my padres.

meanings.definition: The professional baseball team based in San Diego.
meanings.sent1: I went to watch the Padres play at the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The Padres won the game with a home run in the ninth inning.
meanings.sent3: The Padres' mascot entertained the crowd with funny dances.
meanings.sent4: The Padres' victory brought joy to the entire city.
meanings.sent5: Watching the Padres play live is an unforgettable experience.

meanings.sent1: In Spanish, we say 'padres' to mean fathers.
meanings.sent2: My abuelo and abuela are my padres in Spanish culture.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly introduced her padres to her friends.
meanings.sent4: The word 'padres' in Spanish holds a special place in my heart.
meanings.sent5: Learning about different cultures helps us understand the term 'padres' better.
